summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement to Puget Sound Power & Light Company across the City of Seattle City Light Department's Bothell to Maple Valley transmission line right-of-way in the northwest quarter of Section 28, Township 25 North, Range 5 East, W.M., King County, Washington (vicinity of Northeast 24th Street and 124th Avenue Northeast, Bellevue, Washington) (P.M. \#250528-2-301).
